name: Save Garden - Zombie attack
description:
Save garden is an funny clicker game. In this fantasy world, you play a flower to denfend horrible zombies. Don't worry, the flower has various powerful skill to update, and many plant partners to help you denfend zombies.

Features:

* Simple and fun gameplay.
* Over 50 species of rare flowers to update.
* 30 more plant partners.
* Exciting boss stage.
* Live animations and polished graphics.
* Free to play.
